Field.Label: Pairing:
Field.Title: Start/Finish

Field.Label: If you are having problems with the plugin (or you are instructed by support), you can enable extra logging in the Event Log window by checking this button. Use with caution.

Enter the IP address or host name assigned to the Hue hub by your router. If you are unable to find the IP address given to your Hue hub using your router's administrative interface, you can obtain the Hue hub's IP address by registering on and using the www.meethue.com web site, then viewing your hub settings.

After the IP address or host name has been entered, click the Start/Finish button. Go to the Hue hub and press the button in the center of the hub, then come back to this dialog and press the Start/Finish button again.
Once this is done, click the Save button.
